title: Ep - 142 - “CAKE BOSS” BUDDY VALASTRO AND TODD CHRISLEY
description:
Buddy Valastro is best known as the star of the reality television series Cake Boss, which has aired on TLC for 9 years. He talks about his inspiring career, love of family, and the fact the Gorgas from Real Housewives of New Jersey are his neighbors. 


Todd Chrisley is the Southern dad with a sharp tongue on USA Network’s hit show Chrisley Knows Best. He discusses how his family became reality television stars and hilariously explains how he monitors his children’s social media accounts. 


Kate’s dad is forced to take a test about real and made up reality television shows. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com
